Name: maintenance, solid oxide fuel cell, with micro gas turbine, 180kW electrical, future | maintenance, solid oxide fuel cell, with micro gas turbine, 180kW electrical, future | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/33:Repair and installation of machinery and equipment/331:Repair of fabricated metal products, machinery and equipment/3314:Repair of electrical equipment
Description: Hybrid system combining a 125 kWe solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with tubular stack design and a 55kWe micro gas turbine. For central cogeneration use. Performance, stack lifetime and catalyst use according to expected future values for a serial product. Operation with connection to low pressure gas network. Electrical efficiency 58%, total efficiency 80%.
